name: BorderWizard
0:
”Alexa, ask Border Wizard what is the wait time at the Ambassador Bridge”
”Alexa, ask Border Wizard what is the crossing time at the Ambassador Bridge”
”Alexa, ask Border Wizard how long is the delay at the Ambassador Bridge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: border wizard
des: A skill which gives wait times for border crossings between Canada and USA. Currently supports Ambassador Bridge. Detroit Windsor Tunnel, Blue Water Bridge, Nexus & Truck lanes coming soon!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
